timeline.bodyText: Could you remove _ before the number? i.e., rename testDDRExtJunit_MonitorsAndDeadlock_1  to testDDRExtJunit_MonitorsAndDeadlock1. testDDRExtJunit_MonitorsAndDeadlock_1  will cause confusion as TKG adds suffix _<number> to test name as well. Please also change the rest of tests in this PR.
timeline.author: llxia
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -130,4 +130,154 @@ SPDX-License-Identifier: EPL-2.0 OR Apache-2.0 OR GPL-2.0 WITH Classpath-excepti
 		</impls>
 	</test>
 
+	<test>
+		<testCaseName>testDDRExtJunit_MonitorsAndDeadlock_1</testCaseName>

timeline.message:

timeline.bodyText: Please change the variable name to avoid confusion. LIBPATH -> TEST_LIB_PATH
timeline.author: llxia
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -130,4 +130,160 @@ SPDX-License-Identifier: EPL-2.0 OR Apache-2.0 OR GPL-2.0 WITH Classpath-excepti
 		</impls>
 	</test>
 
+	<test>
+		<testCaseName>testDDRExtJunit_MonitorsAndDeadlock1</testCaseName>
+		<variations>
+			<variation>Mode101</variation>
+			<variation>Mode601</variation>
+		</variations>
+		<command>ant -DJAVA_COMMAND=$(JAVA_COMMAND) -DLIBPATH=$(Q)$(TEST_LIB_PATH_VALUE)$(Q) \

timeline.bodyText: Only certain tests have LIBPATH set. This change will set  java.library.path  to empty for other tests. Please a variable as arg, similar to ${JVM_OPTIONS}.
timeline.author: llxia
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -147,10 +151,13 @@ SPDX-License-Identifier: EPL-2.0 OR Apache-2.0 OR GPL-2.0 WITH Classpath-excepti
 			<arg line="${DUMP_OPTION}" />
 			<arg line="-Xitsn1000" />
 			<arg line="${EXTRADUMPOPT}" />
-			<arg value="-Xjit:{j9vm/test/corehelper/CoreGen.main*}(count=0)"/>
+			<arg line="${JVM_OPTIONS}" />
+			<arg line="-Djava.library.path=${LIBPATH}"/>
